name: Caveman Adventures
description:
Caveman adventures is a game which will make you a hero! Jungle was captured by the aliens and many prehistoric animals were caught and placed in cages. Dinosaurs, pterodactyls and many other prehistoric animals are scared, sad and lonely. But not all is lost yet, a caveman named Dov has decided to save his friends and all animals. He does not understand what forces have captured his friends, but he is ready to fight with them.

Help him in his quest to rescue his best friends. Run away from the aliens, destroy the cages with animals and collect stars. Beware of stones and rockets, jump over the water. On the jungle are many different dangerous obstacles. This is a fun and addictive game that the whole family will enjoy!

Dive yourself in the funny prehistoric world. Dangerous situations and fast pursuer will keep you tension. You would like to play again and again to get the best results. You can compete with all your family members and see which one of you is the best.

With Caveman adventures game you will never get bored. Dov can run, accelerate and fly with parachute, if this is necessary, but if Dov will get tired he may ask his friends: bull and gorilla, to give him a ride. Run forward, collect stars and change them to rockets, new rides on bull or gorilla, to the acceleration and many other cool features. You can dress your caveman to give him a special style. Download the game and find out what else it can offer you. I am sure you will not regret.Key features:
  • Funny colorful design
  • Funny music and personages
  • Easy control
  • Universal game for all ages
Controllers:
  • A - jump
  • S - down
  • D - buster
